events.name: eds-slider-high-value
events.description: fires on `highValue` change and outputs the numeric value

events.name: eds-slider-value
events.description: fires on `value` change and outputs the numeric value

events.name: eds-slider-error-high-value
events.description: fires an error message if `highValue` is invalid

events.name: eds-slider-error-value
events.description: fires an error message if `value` is invalid

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: To disable the slider component. If true, slider and textbox cannot be interacted with.

properties.name: hasError
properties.description: Marks the slider visually as being invalid (textbox becomes red).

properties.name: hideLimitLabels
properties.description: To display min and max values on slider.

properties.name: hidePointerLabels
properties.description: To hide popover shown above the slider thumb. When false the popover is only shown when the slider is focused.

properties.name: highValue
properties.description: If in range mode, `highValue` represents the position of the right thumb.

properties.name: isInRangeMode
properties.description: When slider is in currently in range mode, uses `highValue` for position of right thumb and `value` for position of left thumb.

properties.name: isVolumeControlMode
properties.description:
When slider is in currently in volume control mode, volume icons change as the slider value increases and decreases.
mute icon: 0, low volume icon: 0-35, medium volume icon: 36-75, high volume icon: 76-100

properties.name: maximum
properties.description: Maximum value of the slider. The user cannot choose more than the max.

properties.name: minimum
properties.description: Minimum value of the slider. The user cannot choose less than the min.

properties.name: noSwitchingRange
properties.description: To not allow endpoints to cross when `isInRangeMode` is enabled.

properties.name: showTicksValues
properties.description: To show ticks values on slider.

properties.name: stepButtons
properties.description: To display + and - buttons. If true, buttons will be displayed on the slider.

properties.name: stepSize
properties.description:
Specifies the step size for the slider values (for increment or decrement operations using + and - buttons). Step size should be defined as an absolute value.
Default step size is 1. It will be set to the default when stepSize < 1.

properties.name: textbox
properties.description: To display textbox with slider value.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value for the slider's handle. If in range mode, `value` represents the position of the left thumb.

EDSSlider.description: A **slider** is an input control represented by a horizontal or vertical bar with an indicator called a “thumb” that illustrates the current value. Sliders can be used to set defined, contiguous values (such as volume or brightness) or a range of discrete values (such as screen resolution settings). The slider enables the user to select from a range of pre-defined values by moving (grabbing and sliding) the thumb along the bar between a minimum and maximum value continuum to adjust the control setting.
EDSSlider.name: Slider
EDSSlider.usage:
eds-slider is a web component which allows user to select a value from a range of values by moving the slider thumb. When a step value is given, the slider will quantize all values to match that step value, except for the minimum and maximum values, which can always be set. This is to ensure consistent behavior. By default, step size is 1. The slider by default will be continuous, but can be changed to discrete (when ticks are enabled), ranged (with two thumbs when highValue enabled), and vertical when enabled The slider has the following keyboard bindings. key | Action :----------------|:------------- Right arrow | Increment the slider value by one step Up arrow | Increment the slider value by one step Left arrow | Decrement the slider value by one step Down arrow | Decrement the slider value by one step Page up | Increment the slider value approximately by 10 percentage of steps Page down | Decrement the slider value approximately by 10 percentage of steps End | Set the value to the maximum possible Home | Set the value to the minimum possible
The following CSS variables are available for styling : CSS Variable | Description :----------------|:------------- --eds-slider-track-color | Color of slider track --eds-slider-track-selected-color | Color of selected slider track --eds-slider-track-selected-disabled-color | Color of selected disabled slider track --eds-slider-track-active-color | Color of active slider track --eds-slider-track-disabled-color | Color of disabled slider track --eds-slider-tick-color | Color of slider tick --eds-slider-tick-label-color | Color of slider tick label --eds-slider-value-color | Color of slider value --eds-slider-value-disabled-color | Color of disabled slider value --eds-slider-output-text-highlighted | Color of highlighted output text --eds-slider-thumb-color | Color of slider thumb --eds-slider-thumb-focus-color | Color of focused slider thumb --eds-slider-thumb-active-color | Color of active slider thumb --eds-slider-thumb-before-active-color | Color of before active slider thumb --eds-slider-thumb-disabled-color | Color of disabled slider thumb --eds-slider-model-color | Background color of popover shown above slider thumb --eds-slider-model-border-color | Border color of popover shown above slider thumb --eds-slider-button-color | Background color of slider step button --eds-slider-button-border-color | Border color of slider step button --eds-slider-button-icon-color | Color of slider step button icon --eds-slider-textbox-background-color | Background color of slider textbox --eds-slider-textbox-border-color | Border color of slider textbox --eds-slider-textbox-disabled-value-color | Color of disabled slider textbox --eds-slider-textbox-disabled-border-color | Border color of disabled slider textbox

events.name: eds-slider-high-value
events.description: fires on `highValue` change and outputs the numeric value

events.name: eds-slider-value
events.description: fires on `value` change and outputs the numeric value

events.name: eds-slider-error-high-value
events.description: fires an error message if `highValue` is invalid

events.name: eds-slider-error-value
events.description: fires an error message if `value` is invalid
